dialogue: The two arrive at an encampment.
We're here!
Where exactly is 'here'?
Welcome to Trojan! Or rather, its headquarters.
Headquarters?
Yeah. A group of volunteers came around this planet
and set up this place for people with financial problems.
They gave food, a place to sleep, and other support.
Eventually, we, the Militia, turned it into a refugee camp for the war...
The supplies you brought were mostly
a restock of common medicines and supplements.
We were nearly running out, here!
Huh...
It was Shandy who hired you, right?
He sent me a telegram about it earlier.
Sorry, you must've been worried about
what stuff you were actually delivering!
I can't deny that. He was kind of scary when he came up to me.
Haha. Here, I should give you the rest of your payment.
Thanks.
Actually...If you're up for it, we could use more of your help.
This place, you can see how lively it is, can't you?
They look so happy, like their worlds haven't
been absolutely ripped apart by others.
That stupid Empire decided to start a war
for the whole Tares galaxy. And they dragged
innocent civilians into the crossfire!
These people, they've lost their livelihoods.
Years worth of family memories and traditions.
But they can still smile today.
They can still chase after a tomorrow.
That's what we're fighting for. Fighting to protect.
Fighting to promise for everyone else suffering in this war.
So? What's your call? Are you interested?
